Turn on Location permission After that, %s could search and connect with the device Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow %s use the Location permission %1$s requires access to Location permission. If the permissions are not on, %2$s cannot be used normally. %1$s requires access to bluetooth scan contract and location permission. If the permissions are not on, %2$s cannot be used normally.
